pitch.title: Tarrifs campsite pitches
list: During low and mid season (until the 10th of July), on presentation of ACSI-card, the fee of €18,00 (incl. camping pitch, 2 persons, power) applies, with the special promotion 7=6, 14=12, 21=18 etc…!
We ask a down payment of 25% of the total costs.
The remaining sum has to be paid on arrival day.
We have a limited number (35) of rental tabletop model fridges for the price of €5,00 per night.

mobilhome.title: Tarfifs mobilhome
list: The prices for the rental accommodation are valid for 5 persons and are including baby bed en children’s chair. Tariff for each extra person is €8,25 or €5,25 per day.
A bed linen set is for rent for €8,00 p.p.
Final clean up for the mobilhomes: €50,00
Down payment of 25% of the total rental fee at booking; the remaining to be paid 6 weeks before arrival.
content: (*) Special offer during low season: 50% discount on the second consecutive week
Offer valid if both weeks are entirely in low season.

availabilities.title: Availability of our mobilhomes in high season
availabilities.subtitle: In low season, we still have plenty of availabilities.
